48604b79ff6d.title: So much internalized raged toward fathers (men).

content.subtitle: The problem isn’t ‘fathers’, or fatherhood. It is the lack of empathy, respect and communication. There is nothing wrong and everything…

paragraphs.name: e824
paragraphs.text: So much internalized raged toward fathers (men). I worry for her son and what poison has been poured into his head. Worse, trapped in the Marxist narrative of oppressed and oppressor ~victim and victimizer ~ I don’t see how she can find a way out.

dc33f176d00f.title: Actually, it’s a kind of map of what it felt like to come from an abusive home up and through an…

paragraphs.name: d3fd
paragraphs.text: Actually, it’s a kind of map of what it felt like to come from an abusive home up and through an education that did not fully incude the voices and bodies of women and people of color. Thanks for the sugar though.We live in the same country. One in which I am allowed to vote. That vote was hard won. It cost lives. Peace, L.

78e2bc0c10f4.title: This should be called, “Why Trump Won.”

paragraphs.name: 96da
paragraphs.text: This should be called, “Why Trump Won.” Or “Why Women Shouldn’t Be Allowed To Vote.” goo goo goo whine whine whine. A litany of Annual Almanac historical events, cliches and received liberal wisdom, punctuated by estrogen and saline.

virtuals.subtitle: In the 80’s, women began to speak publicly about incest and sexual abuse. As a peer counselor to women, I heard stories of such horror that…

content.subtitle: In the 80’s, women began to speak publicly about incest and sexual abuse. As a peer counselor to women, I heard stories of such horror that…

paragraphs.name: b99b
paragraphs.text: Thank you, Lidia. Daughters ( and sisters ) will always be shamed when we speak out, shamed sometimes even by other daughters. Incest is the first colonization, the first of many attempts to disempower women, as girls, so that by the time we reach adulthood, we are already deeply enculturated to deny ourselves our right to power.

4c151b9abb54.title: Lovely writing. Thanks for sharing your story and your world.

paragraphs.name: 8ab3
paragraphs.text: Lovely writing. Thanks for sharing your story and your world.

a78d5b83aac.title: This is an excellent read, well done!!

paragraphs.text: This is an excellent read, well done!! You’ve articulated what a patrist world is like… from one abuser to another. Destroy and hurt everything that matters in the name of progress (actually it’s greed and power)… Start with the daughter, move onto the woman… Again, I loved this!

a6ce2aa1cba5.title: Anyone who has reached the wisdom to write so beautifully — and personally — has already…

content.subtitle: I know your defenses aren’t perfect and some of the acidic bile that wells up from their emptiness to spew from their lips may pockmark you…

paragraphs.name: dc53
paragraphs.text: Anyone who has reached the wisdom to write so beautifully — and personally — has already accumulated some defense against the trolls that are prodded out of their holes by the fire of your words, so I won’t tell you to ignore the Russian operative with the phony woman’s name (bad) or the “benign patriarch” who is so ‘worried’ about your son, but…
